verses.name: Ezekiel 27:24
verses.text: These were thy merchants in all sorts of things, in blue clothes, and broidered work, and in chests of rich apparel, bound with cords, and made of cedar, among thy merchandise.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:25
verses.text: The ships of Tarshish did sing of thee in thy market: and thou wast replenished, and made very glorious in the midst of the seas.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:26
verses.text: Thy rowers have brought thee into great waters: the east wind hath broken thee in the midst of the seas.
